mean_cn: adj. 单独的，个别的，独有的；  n. 个人，个体
mean_en: considered separately rather than as part of a group
word_etyma: in不，非 + divid分开，分割 + ual → 不可分割的 → individual 个人，独立的个体
short_phrase: an individual member of the group
sentence: The individual toilet cubicle ensures the privacy.
sentence_trans: 厕所的独立隔间保障了个人隐私。
